title: Looker Studio Google Ads Dashboard Template
subtitle: Monitor spend, clicks, conversions, and ROAS for your Google Ads in Looker Studio.
author: Windsor.ai
description: Ready-to-use Looker Studio template to visualize Google Ads performance across campaigns, ad groups, keywords, and devices with KPIs like cost, CTR, CPA, and ROAS.

title: Looker Studio Google Ads vs Facebook Ads Dashboard
subtitle: Compare Google Ads against Facebook Ads across spend, reach, and conversions.
author: Windsor.ai
description: Cross-channel PPC comparison dashboard for Looker Studio that contrasts Google Ads and Facebook Ads KPIs to spot efficiency gaps and budget opportunities.

title: Free Google Ads Budget Tracker Dashboard Template for Looker Studio
subtitle: Track daily pacing vs. budget caps and prevent overspend in Google Ads.
author: Windsor.ai
description: Budget pacing dashboard that charts spend vs target, remaining budget, burn rate, and projected month-end totals for Google Ads accounts and campaigns.

title: Free Google Ads Funnel Dashboard Template for Looker Studio
subtitle: Visualize the full Google Ads funnel from impressions to conversions.
author: Windsor.ai
description: A funnel-focused template connecting Google Ads to show drop-offs, CPA by stage, assisted conversions, and performance by campaign, network, and device.

title: Power BI Google Ads Dashboard Template
subtitle: End-to-end Google Ads reporting in Power BI with refreshable data.
author: Windsor.ai
description: Power BI template highlighting spend, clicks, CTR, CPC, conversions, CPA, and ROAS with drill-downs to campaigns, ad groups, keywords, and geo.

title: Power BI Google Ads Funnel Overview Dashboard Template
subtitle: Map Google Ads performance across awareness, consideration, and conversion.
author: Windsor.ai
description: A Power BI funnel model showing stage-wise metrics, assisted paths, CPA by step, and campaign contributions to pipeline and revenue.

title: Power BI Google Ads Search Term Dashboard Template
subtitle: Analyze search terms to manage negatives and harvest converting queries.
author: Windsor.ai
description: Search term deep-dive in Power BI with queries, match types, costs, conversions, and ROAS to optimize keywords, negatives, and budgets.

title: Tableau Google Ads Dashboard Template
subtitle: Out-of-the-box Tableau workbook for Google Ads KPIs and trends.
author: Windsor.ai
description: Interactive Tableau dashboard for Google Ads with campaign and keyword drill-downs, device splits, CPA and ROAS tracking, and date comparisons.

title: Tableau Google Ads Search Queries Dashboard Template
subtitle: Explore search queries, costs, and conversions to refine keyword lists.
author: Windsor.ai
description: A Tableau template focusing on search queries, match types, spend, conversions, and ROAS to surface waste and scale winners.

title: Google Sheets Google Ads Report Dashboard Template
subtitle: Lightweight Google Ads reporting in Google Sheets with charts and pivots.
author: Windsor.ai
description: A spreadsheet dashboard pulling Google Ads metrics into Sheets for fast KPI tracking, trend charts, campaign pivots, and shareable stakeholder views.

title: Free PPC Report Dashboard Template on Looker Studio
subtitle: Unified PPC overview across Google Ads and other channels in Looker Studio.
author: Windsor.ai
description: Cross-channel PPC scorecard and trends with spend, clicks, conversions, and efficiency metrics, ideal for weekly executive reporting.

title: Power BI Facebook Ads vs Google Ads Report Template
subtitle: Benchmark Google Ads against Meta Ads in a single Power BI view.
author: Windsor.ai
description: Side-by-side comparison of Google and Facebook Ads performance with CPA, ROAS, CTR, and CPC to guide budget shifts.

title: Tableau Facebook Ads vs Google Ads Report Dashboard Template
subtitle: Compare Google and Facebook Ads efficiency by campaign and audience.
author: Windsor.ai
description: Tableau workbook to contrast channels on cost, CTR, CPA, and ROAS with filters for geo, device, and time to drive allocation decisions.

title: Power BI Multichannel Marketing Attribution Dashboard
subtitle: Attribute conversions across Google Ads and other channels in Power BI.
author: Windsor.ai
description: Attribution models (first, last, multi-touch, and data-driven) to quantify Google Adsâ€™ contribution in multi-touch journeys and optimize channel mix.

title: Google Sheets Budget Pacing Template for Google Ads, Facebook, LinkedIn
subtitle: Simple budget pacing for Google Ads with daily burn and forecast.
author: Windsor.ai
description: A Google Sheets model to track spend vs plan, remaining budget, pacing percentage, and end-of-month projections across channels including Google Ads.
